title: Real Jobs from Home: Make Money Online & Work from Home with 100+ Companies
description: Want the names of real companies that hire people to work at home?Is it possible to find a job working from home? Absolutely! There are lots of legitimate companies that will pay you to work from home. You don’t even have to spend hours scouring the internet to find companies that offer online employment - I’ve done it for you. No matter what your skills are, there’s something in this book for you. Over 100 companies are listed under different work from home jobs like sales, transcription, customer service, and many more. I’ve worked from home for over fifteen years, and I love it. So, what are you waiting for?
author: Ellen Kampen
